types.html:
sentir le vécu

  1. (informal) to seem true to life, to be a sign that a person has really experienced something in person
    Ça sent le vécu ! ― It sounds like you're speaking from experience!
trans: to seem true to life, to be a sign that a person has really experienced something in person

title: sentir le vécu
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /sɑ̃.tiʁ lə ve.ky/
